attributes.additional_details:
This country cannot help failed economies throughout the EU.
This can only make the UK as poor as them.
Any attempt at making the policys easier on the UK just flies in the face of the basic EU policies of freedom of movement.
Cost £55,000,000 a day to be a part of it, besides the massive cost of refugee camps, interpreters, benefits, childcare and being an obvious soft touch to anyone in the world.
This cannot be done while we are members of this failed union which is destined to cause unrest and instability throughout the whole of the EU.
I never chose to be European, I want my british life back.
